articles.title: US used special hellfire missile to kill ISIS-K targets in Afghanistan - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: NEW DELHI: The US used its special Hellfire missile to strike Islamic State militants in Afghanistan on Saturday in response to the suicide bomb attac.
articles.content: US used special hellfire missile to kill ISIS-K targets in Afghanistan
